sqlMap.insert:
SELECT (IFNULL(MAX(SN), 0)+1) SN FROM FILE_READER_WRITE
INSERT INTO FILE_READER_WRITE ( SN , UUID , FILE_SN , FILE_NM , FILE_COURS , FILE_TYPE , UPDT_DT , FILE_SIZE , USEYN ) VALUES ( #sn# , #uuid# , #fileSn# , #fileNm# , #fileStreCours# , #fileType# , SYSDATE() , #fileSize# , #useYn#)

INSERT INTO FILE_DETAIL_INFO ( FILE_SN , FILE_STRE_COURS , STRE_FILE_NM , ORIGNL_FILE_NM , FILE_EXTSN , FILE_CN , FILE_SIZE ) VALUES ( #fileSn# , #fileStreCours# , #streFileNm# , #orignlFileNm# , #fileExtsn# , #fileCn# , #fileSize#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT SN, UUID, FILE_SN fileSn, FILE_NM fileNm, FILE_COURS fileStreCours, FILE_TYPE fileType, UPDT_DT updtDt, FILE_SIZE fileSize, USEYN useYn FROM FILE_READER_WRITE WHERE USEYN='Y' AND UUID = #uuid# ORDER BY SN DESC

SELECT A.SN, A.UUID, A.FILE_SN fileSn, A.FILE_NM, A.FILE_COURS, A.FILE_TYPE, A.UPDT_DT, A.FILE_SIZE, A.USEYN, B.STRE_FILE_NM streFileNm, B.ORIGNL_FILE_NM orignlFileNm FROM FILE_READER_WRITE A JOIN FILE_DETAIL_INFO B USING(FILE_SN) WHERE USEYN='Y' AND UUID = #uuid# AND FILE_SN = #fileSn# ORDER BY SN DESC
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FILE_READER_WRITE WHERE UUID = #uuid# AND FILE_SN = #fileSn#
